cells.value:
* Strong Knowledge on Java, Spring Boot (Embedded Tomcat), REST & SOAP API skills.

* Strong front end skills in HTML5, CSS3, Python and JavaScript libraries

* Knowledge on WordPress CMS Platform to understand of Website Architecture

* Should be interested in implementing the newest technology that can benefit business systems

* Writing good quality, modular, reusable, performant, well documented, unit-tested code

* Strong coding/programming & application development experience
 	
* Good knowledge of working with Oracle SQL, SQL, and MySQL

* Good knowledge on object-oriented design, design patterns, data structures, and algorithms

* Create, evaluate, and make decisions while coordinating with the project team

* Communicate and cooperate with engineering teams, internal and external project stakeholders

cells.value:
* Formulate policies and procedures to improve internal controls, compliance, and efficiency.

* Deliver adequate and timely action plans and monitor progress to address and resolve control Deficiencies.

* Work collaboratively with business and process owners to implement and monitor remediation efforts that result from internal control assessments, ensuring the effective implementation of corrective action.

* Obtain, analyze, and evaluate accounting documentation, previous reports, data, flowcharts etc.

* Identify loopholes and recommend risk aversion measures and cost savings

* Design internal control framework within the organization

* Evaluate on a periodic basis the effectiveness of the key controls via testing or other methods.

* Actively seek standardization and automation, apply, and implement best practices for managing internal controls and deploy innovative technology where possible to enhance and continuously improve the design and operating effectiveness of the controls, documentation, assessment, and review procedures.

cells.value:
1. Responsible for finalization of financial statements (standalone/ consolidated) and results on a quarterly and annual basis under IGAAP and Ind AS.
2. Co-ordinations with auditors/ consultants for finalization of financial accounts, tax audit, and transfer pricing.
3. Preparation of monthly MIS (standalone/ consolidated), presentations, and other reports and scrutiny of general ledger accounts.
4. Reporting to management over various other special reports like the performance of subsidiaries, inventory aging reports etc
5. Preparation of income tax computation, advance tax computation, income tax return etc.
6. Assist in the finalization of annual budgets / consolidated budgets and forecasts on a periodical basis Preparation of budgets, performing variance analysis to determine the difference between projected & actual results and implementing corrective actions for the same
7. Purchase order release control with the checking in SAP
8. Preparation and submission of Annual Progress Report (APR) of Company to Export authority
9. Proper maintenance of monthly fixed assets register, posting of depreciation with shift change control, capitalization of assets, Calculation of profit/ loss on sale of fixed assets.
10. Vouching and verification of journal vouchers /invoices before initiating payments and other overhead payments. Ensuring that voucher is correctly posted, TDS correctly deposited and have proper supporting and authorization
11. Coordination with other department and provide the data as required
12. Evaluation and review of internal controls & resource management
13. Ensuring input credit of GST are properly taken and all requirements of GST Act is complied with.
14 Periodically taking physical inventory of raw material, store and spare items, finished goods

cells.value:
•	Preparing PPAP related documents - ISIR, Gauge R&R, Capability report & Checking aids.
•	Stop non conforming machines/processes, recommend process changes, Identify/Monitor critical in-process Inspection stages, Approve Set-up records, Approve/Inspect critical stage inspection reports, Monitor/verify in-process rejection levels & cost of Poor Quality and updation of daily QMIS with actions
•	Monitoring Statistical process control (SPC) for critical operation.
•	Verification of scrap records, recommend for disposal of scrap, Monitor Cost of scrap & initiate CA Recommend to stop non conforming products going to customer, Prepare and approve PDI Reports, Initiate action on rejected lots/parts, prepare/revise/modify inspection plans, quarantine NC products.
•	Conducting Manufacturing process audit & Product Audit on monthly basis. Process documents will be in-line with SOP, CP & Setup approval reports and Changes will be informed and corrected. Monitor the In-process process measurable for achieving target Vs actual for Quality Parameters.
•	QRM preparation every month for departmental activities. To provide KPI data on time.
•	Identifying and monitoring the Calibration due for in-process gauges. Identify the Pokayoke and implement the same for required process & Verification of Pokayoke working on daily basis.
•	Display of Visual aids, Quality alerts & Customer complaints to related work spot. Routine follow up pf regular activities in line.
•	Process documents will be in-line with SOP, CP & set up approval reports & changes will be informed and corrected.

cells.value:
•	To plan daily, weekly, and monthly with reference to customer requirement.
•	Production Planning Monthly planning as per production capacity and scheduling for In-house as well as outside job work requirement. Monitoring and Reviewing Planned V/s Actual status of productions, materials and manpower availability, Release of Daily production Schedule.
•	Inventory Level Monitoring schedule v/s actual supply and delays in supply of materials and proactively resolving the same by escalation to vendor/material team/ management. Solving the supplier issues if any to ensure timely supply. communicate monthly schedule to supplier, Monthly SOB Send to Purchase, Daily follow up with HODs to ensure material availability as per customer requirement.
•	Monitor material supply flow and identify any shortages.
•	Complete involvement in inventory level management to identify, escalate and resolve the concerns with respective HODs and Plant Manager.
•	Address issues regarding production and quality.
•	Monitor and report performance of production.
•	Co-ordination with Marketing, Purchase, Production and Quality Departments to meet targets.
•	MIS report submission to Plant Manager and Corporate Office.
•	Train the team; extend support to develop skills and improve team spirit.
•	To be as role-model for fellow team members. 
•	Any other task / assignment as directed by reporting officer or reviewing officer.

cells.value:
•	Man Power planning & Control as per customer plan in Assembly Line.
•	Achieving daily production plan and Targets as per the customer schedule.
•	Line Rejection Controls on daily basis.
•	Monitoring hourly production by line / Section wise on daily basis and prepare the report for review & loss analysis with HOD.
•	Ensure working condition of Poka Yoke and Effective implementation of CA.
•	Ensure Competent and multi Skilled operator for Production processes.
•	Ensure “ZERO” WIP and frequent Review to clearing rework cables on daily basis.
•	Ensure daily 4M condition and update the loss.
•	Control of tools gauges & Fixtures and maintain as per the standard on daily basis.
•	Handling the customer audit/QMS & IATF audit.
•	Drive the TPM “JH” Pillar at Assembly line.
•	Ensure to getting and implementation of Kai-Zen and suggestion from the shop floor team.
•	Maintaining 5S & and conduct frequent audit to Ensure 100% work place safety at shop floor.
•	Co-ordinate with RMS & PPC for daily production plan and materials availability to achieve the daily production target.
•	Ensuring “ZERO” customer compliant.
•	Maintaining Quality documents like Operator Check Sheet , Skill Matrix , etc.
•	Ensure monthly Skill matrix review and update.
•	Any other task / assignment as directed by reporting officer or reviewing officer.

cells.value:
•	Drive Process improvements, Cycle time reduction initiatives & Productivity improvements via process change or improvements.
•	Developing the Jigs, Fixtures & Tooling drawings in 3d or 2d.
•	Good skill on preparing the Plant Layouts.
•	Initiating the Kaizen activities overall the plant.
•	Active involvement in new product launches and Provides subsequent support to plant Launch Manager and plant Program Manager.
•	Estimates manufacturing cost, evaluates time standards, Makes recommendations for tooling & process requirements of new or existing product lines.
•	Developing required jigs and fixtures and special equipment (SPM) for that particular project.
•	Jigs & Fixtures procurement & trial activities. 
•	Network with cross-functional team to improve the process 
•	Provide technical support for quality controls, process improvements, cost savings, process development projects and product launches
•	Involved in cost reduction activities to meet annual cost reduction as per organization targets
•	Knowledge of World Class Manufacturing (WCM) or Lean manufacturing methodologies
•	Knowledge of Lean manufacturing tools – 5s, value stream mapping, process center lining, SMED, standard work, Kaizen, etc

cells.value:
• Support operation of SMT line including solder paste dispensing, solder paste inspection, dispensing machine, pick and place machinery, reflow oven, automated optical inspection, as well as various backend assembly processes including conformal coating, robotic soldering, wave solder, harness and connector assembly.
• Specific direct responsibilities will include testing and failure analysis support through development and improvement of programs and processes for ICT, Functional testing, EOL & traceability systems.
• Develop, program and improve all SMT processes and process validations.
• Optimize setup/programs to improve equipment efficiencies and output, accordingly        should establish the new line setup with Interactions of functional teams like R&D, PPC & Production for smooth operation as per customer requirements
• Coordinate with suppliers and meet the timelines related to fixtures, testing equipments with respect to cycle time of each process and takt time.
•Reduce product cost and improve quality, poke yoke implementation in shopfloor.
• Conduct failure mode analysis and develop corrective action plans.
• Maintain and write work instructions, process flow, and process failure modes effects analysis documents.
• Should be fast leaners and should understand new technology / technique implement in process. 
• Must be a team player with excellent communication skills.

cells.value:
Responsibility:
1. Involvement in CFT discussions
2. Deep knowledge of production management 
3. Experience in reporting on key production metrics
4. Outstanding communication ability
5. Excellent organizational and leaderships skills
6. Strong decision-making skills and a results-driven approach
7. Manage and evaluate machine resources to ensure productivity and minimal downtime
8. Strive to reduce expenses and increase productivity across all product lines
9. Ensure all employees follow industry standard health and safety guidelines
10. Provide motivation, support and guidance to all employees
11. Ability to coach and mentor employees on a one-on-one basis as well as as a group
12. Understanding of quality standards and health & safety regulations 
13. Take care of Shop-floor 5’s and visual management
14. Need to improve work zone management 
15. Manpower management throughout shop
16. Responsible for production targets to deliver on-time
17. Minimize process scrap with new ideas
18. On time decision making about tooling correction / improvements


Qualification and other requirements:

1. BE in mechanical Engineering
2. Supervise and evaluate performance of production personnel (quality inspectors, workers etc.)
3. Determine amount of necessary resources (workforce, raw materials etc.)
4. Ensure output meets quality standards
5. Enforce health and safety precautions
6. Report to upper management
7. Relocate near to office

cells.value:
Responsibility:

•Bill-Booking of GRN done invoices.
•Verifying and accounting of Manual Invoices.
•Accounting of manual invoices to respective charge A/c.
•Preparing Invoices for Payment process
•Verifying E-way Bill details against debit notes and reporting to HOD
•Mailing of RTV debit notes to supplier and closure of debit notes on timely basis
•Accounting of manual debit notes and credit notes as per HOD instructions.
•Updating of GST Status of supplier on Payment advice
•Passing of Payment entries in ERP
•Writing down cheques as per payment advice along with vendor Account Numbers.
•Submission of prepared cheques to HOD and Plant head
•Ensuring signatures and couriering cheques to Corporate Office
•Updating Unit Cheque track sheet on timely basis
•Accounting of Negative sales orders for internal cancellation of Invoices
•Accounting of Customer rejection invoices and Shortage receipts
•Accounting of Cash Vouchers and reconciliation physical cash and Cash Book
•Closure of IOU Payments within time limit
•Passing prepayment entries and closure of prepayments within time limit
•Updating of monthly provision sheet and ensuring accounting of provision bills within month end
•Scanning of Fixed Asset Bills along with supporting documents
•Preparing GSTR-2B reconciliation and reporting to HOD
•Customer GRN Details updating and providing data to Internal audit purpose
•Mailing job work vendors for confirmation of Stock at quater end
•Preparing 3rd Party stock confirmation data and reporting to HOD
•Accounting of AR Invoices and generating Eway bill.
•Accounting of Supplementary invoices as per HOD instructions.
•Preparing and updating documents for Internal Audit controls-smart sheet updations
•Reconciliation of Vendor Ledgers
•Ensuring proper filing and maintaining of all documents	



Qualification and other requirements:

•Qualification: B. Com
•Experience: 4 - 5 Years
•Good verbal and written communication skills.
•Good in computer skills i.e., MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
•Positive attitude: willingness to learn and flexibility.

Rolls & Responsibility:

•Verification of Purchase Bills.
•Confirmation of Inward stores and gate entry seals.
•Verification of vendor invoices’-way Bill and E-Invoice.

•Ensuring tax category in invoices before accounting of GRN.
•GRN of Vendor Invoices
•Reconciliation of manual inward and outward register on daily basis
•System gate Inward/Outward entry verification
•Filing of sales invoices on daily basis
•Updating of GRN Number in manual inward register on daily basis
•Updating of GRN Number in “Gate Entry Systems”
•Verification of Transport bills.
•Arranging vendor invoices for payment process.
•Verification of Sales register on daily basis
•Mailing of sales register to respective departments.
•Reconciliation of E-way Bill and E-Invoice and mailing to HOD.
•Validate & Accounting of RTV debit notes in ERP and follow up with purchase team to dispatch of goods to vendor in specified time.
•Scanning of RTV debit notes.
•Follow up with purchase department for any vendor invoice defaults.
•Arranging signed cheques and sending them to respective vendors by courier.
•Keeping records of courier details related to vendor payments.

Preparing PPAP related documents - ISIR, Gauge R&R, Capability report & Checking aids.

cells.value:
A systems developer is a type of software developer. They develop and implement applications and programs for the backend processing systems used in businesses and organizations.
•	Analyze users' needs and then design, test, and develop software/application to meet those needs.
•	Using development tools to write and test code to develop these solutions.
•	Writing documentation and operating manuals.
•	Testing and modifying systems to ensure that they operate reliably.
•	User training and support.
•	Fault finding, diagnosing and fixing bugs.

1.Should be able to read customer assembly drawings and child part drawing with tolerance and their standards for better understanding of customer and SAL requirements.
2. Should have minimum knowledge in ANPQP and PPAP documents.
3.Should have basic knowledge of Injection molding tools, Compression molding tools, Press tools.
3.Should have basic knowledge in Plastic, Rubber and Steel raw materials.
4.Knowledge in PLM / ERP is added advantage.
5.Basic knowledge in IATF, TS and ISO audit requirements will be added advantage.
6.Should be able to take pre line trials and sample build in assembly line along with Subordinate and do process capability validation.
7.Should able to follow up child part tooling status with tool maker and visit for trials and capable to do preliminary PPAP requirements.
8.Should able to understand Production planning and material planning concept.
9.Should able to do work in PLM software to upload required documents as per training.
10.Follow up with supplier on child parts procurement and co ordinate with SQA team for arrange PPAP audit and smooth transfer to regular purchase.

Job Description
Employee Name	
Designation (Role)	 GET -  Quality
Grade	Staff
Reporting Officer(Supervisor)	Mr. Vinoda V, Deputy Manager
Reviewing Officer (Manager)	Mr. Arun Kumar J, Senior Deputy  Manager –  Operations
Region / State / City	South India / Karnataka / Bengaluru.
Work Location	SEL Unit 16  Narasapura , Kolar.

Responsibility:
 Quality Control
 To understand & develop the potentialities of each man & give work to each as per his ability.
Responsible for customer complaint should be zero.
Understanding Customer Requirements.
Receiving of Customer Complaints / Logging, finding root cause / Forcing CA / Validation of CA Responsible for achieving quality goal & objective.
Responsible for supplier development & QAV-II T2 Supplier Audit Verification.
To ensure & verify that 5 ‘S’, TPM & KAIZEN of dept.
Warranty and Line Rejection Analysis / CA and validation and claim settlement To take appropriate safety precautions for Man, M/c & Equipment.
Instruments & Gauges Calibration Status Review 
To work with achieve improvement programme.
Analyze Quality Data and Initiate Continual improvement 
Implementation of PPAP, APQP and FMEA
Responsible for POKA-YOKE Implementation.
BOP Rejection Summary & Supplier PPM , Action Plan Review.
To maintain all QMS , EMS & OHSAS  Documents every  month.
Review the Dept MIS & MRM with top Management.
Responsible for make plan Product & Process Audit, In-house & Suppler end.
Responsible for educate new joining for process & product knowledge.

Qualification and other requirements:
Qualification: BE Mechanical.
Experience:  0-1 year.
Good in computer skills, Good verbal and written communication skills.
Diligent; good in analytical skill with problem solving techniques.
End of Document

cells.value:
1. Responsible for finalization of financial statements (standalone/ consolidated) on quarterly/ basis under IGAAP and Ind AS for audit. 
2.	Preparation of monthly MIS (standalone/ consolidated), presentations and other reports and scrutiny of general ledger accounts for management.
3.	Co-ordinations with auditors/ consultants for finalization of financial accounts, tax audit and transfer pricing.
4.	Representing to income tax authorities and drafting of submissions, reply letters, appeals, etc.	
5.	Reporting to management over various other special reports like performance of subsidiaries, inventory ageing reports etc.
6.	Preparation of income tax computation, advance tax computation, income tax return etc. 
7.	Purchase order release control with the checking in SAP, opening new GL code, cost centre etc. in SAP.
8.	Assist in finalization of annual budgets / consolidated budgets and forecasts on periodical basis Preparation of budgets, performing variance analysis to determine difference between projected & actual results and implementing corrective actions for the same
9.	Proper maintenance of monthly fixed assets register, process of depreciation with shift change control, capitalisation of assets, Calculation of profit/ loss on sale of fixed assets.
10.	Vouching and verification of journal vouchers /invoices before initiating payments and other overhead payment. Ensuring that voucher is correctly posted, TDS correctly deposited and have proper supporting and authorization
11.	Coordination with other department for monthly closing and provide the data as required	
12.	Evaluation and review of internal controls & resource management
13.	Ensuring input credit of GST are properly taken and all requirements of GST Act is complied with. 
14.	Periodically taking physical inventory of raw material, store and spare items, finished goods. 
15. 	Preparation and submission of Annual Progress Report (APR) of Company.

1. Responsible for finalization of financial statements (standalone/ consolidated) on quarterly/ basis under IGAAP and Ind AS for audit. 
2.	Preparation of monthly MIS (standalone/ consolidated), presentations and other reports and scrutiny of general ledger accounts for management.
3.	Co-ordinations with auditors/ consultants for finalization of financial accounts, tax audit and transfer pricing.
4.	Representing to income tax authorities and drafting of submissions, reply letters, appeals, etc.	
5.	Reporting to management over various other special reports like performance of subsidiaries, inventory ageing reports etc.
6.	Preparation of income tax computation, advance tax computation, income tax return etc. 
7.	Purchase order release control with the checking in SAP, opening new GL code, cost centre etc. in SAP.
8.	Assist in finalization of annual budgets / consolidated budgets and forecasts on periodical basis Preparation of budgets, performing variance analysis to determine difference between projected & actual results and implementing corrective actions for the same
9.	Proper maintenance of monthly fixed assets register, process of depreciation with shift change control, capitalisation of assets, Calculation of profit/ loss on sale of fixed assets.
10.	Vouching and verification of journal vouchers /invoices before initiating payments and other overhead payment. Ensuring that voucher is correctly posted, TDS correctly deposited and have proper supporting and authorization
11.	Coordination with other department for monthly closing and provide the data as required	
12.	Evaluation and review of internal controls & resource management
13.	Ensuring input credit of GST are properly taken and all requirements of GST Act is complied with. 
14.	Periodically taking physical inventory of raw material, store and spare items, finished goods. 
15. 	Preparation and submission of Annual Progress Report (APR) of Company.

cells.value:
Responsibility:

Recruitment :-

Maintaining Job description for each position
Preparing manpower requisition for all New & Replacement recruitment as per the department requirement.
Posting Job ads on Naukri and relevant platforms to hire appropriate candidates.
Supporting for Recruitment process I.e Screening & Scheduling the Interview with technical team.
Supporting for employment reference verification
Coordinate with HOD for Preparing offer letters & appointment orders
Taking care of End to End ion boarding process I.e Joining formalities documentation & Scheduling induction training.
Submitting report to HOD about Induction feedback & analysis
Preparing annual attrition report
Taking care of employees F & F Related process. I.e No Due certificate/Exit Interview and preparing first level report of F & F.

Statutory Complaincnes :-

Supporting to prepare the data for Factory Licence Renewal, Annual & Half Yearly returns.
Prepare the Reports for TNPCB Annual returns submission.
Obtaining ESI & EPF number for New joining employees.
Preparing data for Monthly ESI & EPF returns filling
Updating records for employees mediclaim on monthly basis.
Addressing employees grievances related with EPF/ESI & Mediclaim.
Updating employee personal details at ESI/EPF and Mediclaim on time to time.
Supporting to prepare the supplier agreements. I.e Manpower supply, Canteen, Transport etc.
Supporting for Monthly & Yearly statutory review for Manpower suppliers i.e ESI/EPF Retuns Filling, LWF, Contract labour license and P.Tax.

Time Office & Payroll:-

Time office management for both Company/Contract labour
Maintaining and updating day to day attendance and leave management for on roll employees.
Monitors and checks the absenteeism level and counsels all categories of Workmen at and contract labour regular intervals to meet set objectives
Supporting for contract labour allocation I.e recruitment / Background checks and verifying the profiles.
Preparation of salary Inputs. I.e Attendance, LOP Details, Other Earning. Over time and Deductions.
Escalate contract labour issues to HR head for further actions.
Preparing Daily plant MIS report and sending to corporate
Handling procurement of admin related items. I.e First Aid / House keeping / Printer and Pantry etc…
Taking care of complete pantry management and canteen
Make arrangement for issuing uniform and ID card for employees.
Organizing employees engagement & Motivations programs
Ensure and do the daily audit for contract labour uniform & shoes
Taking care of Hospitality Customers/Visitors and any other govt officials
Maintaining employees Records for existing employees such as change of employee personal details, promotions and exit formalities details
Taking care of contract labours Induction training related with work place safety/Company Policy/Do & Don’t and 5S.
Obtaining Bank accounts for new joining employees.
Supervising & Assisting House keeping & Security team.
Supporting to verification of Contract labour attendance on monthly basis for salary process.
Processing all admin related bills I.e security, Milk supply, Canteen and water.
Maintaining employees personal files.
Taking care of Internal audit documents requirement 

Training & Development:-

Ensure the availability of Training need identification for each and every employee from concern HOD.
Organaise the training programs as per the calender
Getting & filling Feed back and attendance post training programs
Updating frequently of training history card
Obtaining training assessment report from the concern HOD

General:-

Conducting monthly review meeting with committee members related with PoSH act
Addressing female workers related grievances and escalating to HOD
Any other task / assignment as directed by reporting officer or reviewing officer

cells.value:
Roles and Responsibilities
Manage end to end travel plans for Executives in India, efficiently and cost-effectively airlines, trains, transport, and hotel bookings.
Negotiate on best rates through vendors every time there is a travel occurrence.
Communicate with the person travelling regularly to keep them updated on logistics.
Manage emergency changes/cancellations.
Handle visa applications, formalities and foreign exchange.
Handle all incoming travel requests and the processes further after proper approvals.

Desired Candidate Profile
 A degree in Hospitality, Travel, Tourism Business or relevant field with 2 to 4 years of experience.
Knowledge of corporate travel economics and travel technology/tools will be an added advantage.
Knowledge of bulk booking software and technologies preferred.
Awareness about international travel regulations, customs, and foreign currencies.
Proficient in MS Word, Outlook and Excel.
 Excellent oral and written communication skills.
High level of professionalism and absolute confidentiality is essential.

cells.value:
Job Description
Role					:	Quality- Engineer /Sr. Engineer 
Position Category			:	Mechanism
Work Experience			:  	3 years minimum
Education Requirement                        :            BE,B.Tech in Mechanical/Automobile
Location				:	Suprajit Engineering limited - Bengalure

Roles & Responsibilities :	
Responsible for overall quality for the mechanism assly and its sub parts ( Supplier Quality, Inprocess, Final & Customer quality)
Monitoring suppliers quality performance and improve low performance suppliers
Responsible for PPAP audit at suppliers in time and periodic audits per year plan
Responsible for IATF 16949 quality system requirement and update the document as and when
Well aware of all latest quality analysis tools
Well aware of SPC, MSA, Cost of quality and Poor quality
Customers performance monitoring and maintaining ZERO ppm at all levels.
Proficient in engineering drawings, engineering standards, dimensioning & tolerance, drawing symbols, GD&T, engineering materials and etc..
Co-ordination with Inter-discipline/customer/vendor and CFT responsibilities for APQP, PPAP, D&PFMEA
Responsible for customer PPAP audit and co ordination with them and internal teams
Requirements & Skills :
3+ years of experience in the Quality function preferably in the Automotive industry

Strong working capability with IATF: 16949 system requirement

Excellent interpersonal, presentation & communication skills, with ability to successfully deliver solutions in alignment with cross functional stakeholder

Responsibilities:
Plan & Coordinate production engineering processes on daily basis to produce high quality products.
Develop process improvements to effectively utilize equipment and material to maximize production.
Develop operational strategies to achieve production and financial objectives.
Identify unsafe operations & practices and report the same to manager immediately.
Establish safety procedures and environmental regulations for employees.
Provide engineering support for production and maintenance activities  to ensure maximum production.
Perform engineering analysis to reduce downtime and outages.
Evaluate current production activities and make recommendations for improvements.
Implement cost reduction initiatives while maintaining high quality standards.
Develop operating instructions and equipment specifications for production activities.
Provide training and guidance to team members to accomplish production goals.
Stay cuuent with production specifications, engineering technology and production processes.
 Develop best practices to improve production capacity, quality and reliability.
Investigate problems, analyze root causes and derive resolutions and report to manager.
Ensure paln v/s achieved on daily and monthly  basis, need t coordinate with CFT team for smooth operations.

Job Description
Role					:	Design and development Engineer
Position Category			:	Mechanism
Work Experience			:  	2 years minimum
Education Requirement                        :            BE,B.Tech in Mechanical/Automobile
Location				:	Suprajit Engineering limited - Bengalure

Roles & Responsibilities :	
Responsible for designing the system and subsystem level components and knowledge on manufacturing methods is important

Produce design ideas, technical plans for prototypes using computer-aided design (CAD) software

Proficient in engineering drawings, engineering standards, dimensioning & tolerance, drawing symbols, GD&T, engineering calculation, engineering materials, tolerance stack-up analysis and etc..

Responsible for creating and maintaining the documents to support manufacturing, testing and assembly (BoM, PFC ,DFM&A, DFMEA, DVP&R and etc..)

Engineering co-ordination with Inter-discipline/client/consultant/contractor/vendor
Responsible for IATF-16949 system requirement related to new product development from designing stage to mass production- Knowledge in APQP, PPAP, D&PFMEA, MSA nad SPC
Child parts sourcing and development
Mechanism/system assly process design and development
Requirements & Skills :
2+ years of experience designing mechanical components and systems from concept through production validation

Strong working capability with (Solidworks , Creo , Catia, etc.)

Excellent interpersonal, presentation & communication skills, with ability to successfully deliver technical solutions in alignment with cross functional stakeholder

cells.value:
Role and Responsibilities
We are looking for an IS&T Engineer who have good knowledge on Active Directory, 0365 Administration, User Management, Server Administration, Firewalls, Antivirus. You will work with other IS&T Engineers and Managers throughout the IT Administration concepts managing 11 engineers and supporting L2 & L3.
Active Directory Administration: User Management, DNS, Group Policy Management.
Server Administration: RAID, Windows and Linux Operating System, File Server, Print Server etc.
0365 Administration: Outlook, SharePoint, OneDrive, MS Teams etc. 
Cloud and Virtualization: Knowledge on Cloud platforms, VMWare, or any other Hyper-Visors
 Firewall & Endpoint: Basic knowledge of Firewall and Endpoint Policies, VPNs, Site to Site,IPsec, SDWAN.
Manage L1 Support Engineers located in other sites and Supporting L2 and L3 Activities.
Manage and Monitor ticketing systems.
Good knowledge on Networking.
We are looking for candidates who are experienced in below said skills.
At least 4 to 6 years as IT Engineer or System Administrator
 Should have knowledge on Active Directory, Networking, Firewalls, 0365 Administration,Endpoint Management.
 Attention to detail communication skills and the ability to influence others.
Strong experience and interest for how IT systems can support organization.
 Strong oral and written communication skills, including sound presentational skills.
Qualification and other requirements:
 Diploma or BE in Computer Science, B.Sc.-IT, BCA or equivalent with 4 to 6 years of experience.

_____________________________________________________________________

Job Description

  Role                    :      Trainee Operator 18 Months
  Reporting Supervisor       :      Prakash,H
  Location                 :      U2, Bangalore 
  Position Category          :      Staff Grade


Main Responsibilities:

● 
Inspection of Parts as per Control Plan
Reporting to SQA Head if any deviation
Segregation and Inspect accepted parts
Safekeeping Gauges and instruments
Timely update of Inspection repot
Report to SQA in case of any Gauge / Instrument wear out
 Report to SQA in case of any Expiry of shelf life materials
Keeping the defective parts in RED BINs with identification
Testing of Parts as per Control Plan
Process set up Inspection

 Desired Profile :

● Education :ITI
● Age : 18 years to 20 Years
● Experience : 0 - 2  Years 
● Good in communication (Oral and Written Communication) and Computer Skills.
● Candidates willing to relocate and stay in and around Bommasandra / Electronic City / Anekal Area are preferred.Candidates residing in these are also preferred.

cells.value: Experience in handling of Tier-2 / Tier-3 / small scale supplier.
cells.displayValue: Experience in handling of Tier-2 / Tier-3 / small scale supplier.

cells.value:
Responsibilities:	
New vendor development with cost saving and with no compromise in quality. 
Generating of SPO / BPO / BPO release & get required approvals.
Raise part approval form for new parts / price amendment.
Support sales target by smooth supply & avoiding material shortages which leads to  line stoppage.
Ensure vendor payment in co-ordination with units  / accounts department.
Maintain the all IATF Related documents.
Passing credit / debit notes according to price amendment & any other issues.
Ensuring regulatory requirements like GST / E-Way Bill in co-ordination with accounts department.
Organize vendor meet as per the plan.
Address & improve the quality performance along with QA Department.
Identify & work on contingency plan to de-risk the supplies.
Freight control & no premium freight to be allowed.
Monitoring & control of pipe line stock i.e., transit / warehouse.
Careful handling of ECN Parts to avoid non-moving / slow moving parts accumulation.
Updating of all ERP related activities related to purchase.
Regularly addressing of vendor rating and improvements thereon.
Achieve business targets as agreed in KRA sign offs.
Desired Profile:
Bachelor's degree with 4-7 Years experience in auto components.
Experience in handling of Tier-2 / Tier-3 / small scale supplier.
Understanding the cost structure & good negotiation skills.
Knowledge about Tax structure / E-way Bill / regulatory requirements.
Knowledge about IATF requirement.
Familiar in Oracle / SAP- Purchase / Material Management modules.

cells.value:
Responsibilities: Implement and Manage Virtual Infrastructure, Backup & Restore.
Virtualization Infrastructure:
Implement and manage virtualization infrastructure.
Configure and optimize virtual machines (VMs) to ensure high performance and availability.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and develop virtualization solutions that meet business needs.
Install, configure, and maintain VMware ESX hosts, vCenter Server, and other virtual environments like OVM, KVM, ZEN etc.
Monitor and troubleshoot virtualization environment to identify and resolve performance issues, system errors, and security vulnerabilities.
Implement and maintain backup and disaster recovery solutions for virtualized environments.
Collaborate with system administrators and network engineers to ensure seamless integration between virtual and physical infrastructure.
Support to handling/ Setting/Configuring Servers
Monitor, troubleshoot, and capacity planning of the virtual environment.
Proactively identify and perform hardware and software upgrades.
Experience in windows server OS, Linux Server OS, patching & troubleshooting etc.
Experience in server Hardware & Troubleshooting.
Knowledge in DNS, DHCP and file services
Analyze server logs & provide root cause analysis during Major incidents.

Backup Administrator.
Install, configure, and maintain Backup software’s and related infrastructure.
Monitor backup and recovery operations to ensure successful completion and timely execution.
Design and implement backup strategies and policies to meet the organization's data protection requirements.
Manage backup schedules, retention periods, and archival processes.
Perform backup and restore operations for various types of data, including files, databases, virtual machines, and applications.
Conduct regular backup testing and verification to ensure data recoverability.
Implement & manage Disaster recovery for enterprise setup.
Troubleshoot backup failures, identify root causes, and implement corrective actions.
Monitor backup storage utilization and capacity planning to ensure optimal usage.
Collaborate with system administrators and IT teams to align backup and recovery processes with overall IT infrastructure.
Document backup procedures, configurations, and changes for future reference.
Perform regular maintenance activities, such as software updates, patches, and system upgrades.
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in backup and recovery technologies.
Provide technical support and guidance to end-users regarding backup and recovery processes.
Assist in disaster recovery planning and participate in the execution of recovery procedures when necessary.
Maintain data security and confidentiality standards throughout backup operations.

Qualification and other requirements:

B.E/B.Tech/BSc/MSc/Equivalent.
Certificate on managing Veeam, BackupExec/Veritas etc.

Preparing proto samples as per customer requirement to meet fit and function.
Creation of BOM & Routing in ERP & uploading the EBOM in PLM
Preparation of PPAP Documents & releasing in PLM
Preparation of PPAP documents and submitting it to customer for approval and uploading in customer portal.
Uploading documents in PLM in timely manner as per target dates, ensuring no over dues. 
Preparing and maintaining APQP and PPAP documents as per IATF procedure.
Facing internal and external audits ensuring 0 NC.
Completing Any other task assigned by reporting  manager.

cells.value:
As Head of internal and controls, he/she plays a critical role in delivering the organization's strategic objectives by objectively assessing the adequacy and effectiveness of governance and management of risks, giving an evidence-based opinion on all aspects of governance, risk management and internal controls.
He/she is responsible for providing guidance to business division heads, plant heads and function heads in India and outside India to strengthen internal audit and control systems.
Assess organization's risk, current activities, information, communication and monitoring system.
Determining internal audit scope and developing annual plans.
Perform full audit cycle including risk management and control management over operations' effectiveness, financial reliability and compliance with all applicable directives and regulations.
Evaluate company's internal controls, including corporate governance and accounting processes.
Ensure compliance with laws and regulations as well as accurate and timely data collection and reporting.
Assess and strengthen internal control procedures such as separation of duties, access controls, physical audits, standardized documentation, trial balances, periodic reconciliations, and approval authority compliance.
Assess and strengthen internal controls methods such as : preventative, detective and corrective systems.
Ensure review and strengthen policies and procedures or technical protections that are put in place to prevent problems and protect the assets and business operations of the company.
Conduct internal audits viz., compliance audits, operational audits, financial audits and information technology audits, submission of audit findings, review of corrective and preventive action points, follow up for closing audit gaps and update the management team to strengthen internal control systems of the company.
Experience in managing internal controls area in manufacturing companies is preferred.
Any other assignment as directed by the reporting supervisor.

Requirements
Qualification: Inter CA / MBA / M.Com / B.Com.
Experience in the internal controls field ranging from 10 to 15 years.
Age : 32 40 years
Strong analytical skills; ability to do fair and logical assessment in internal control areas.
Effective interpersonal and communication skills.
Ability to lead and work well within a team, cross-functional teams and individually.
Willing to undertake travel in India and outside India depending on business requirements.
Good computer knowledge such as Word, Excel, Power Point and google smartsheets, ERP based environment like Oracle / SAP.

Roles and Responsibilities

3.Experience in handling Trade Payable & Trade Receivables
4.Experience in preparation of BRS

7.Experience in sharing data for the Statutory Audit, GST Audit & Internal Audit

1.      Well versed in MS Office, advanced Excel and good communication skill.
2.      Should be well versed with Accounting concepts.
3.      Candidates should have 2 to 3 years’ experience in manufacturing sector.

cells.value:
Role & responsibilities
We are looking for a legal Counsel /Executive  (full time employment) to be responsible for providing support to business division and function heads in India and outside India with legal assistance and advice.
The responsibilities of a legal advisor include drafting legal documents, structuring solutions for issues, and providing support in legal issues.
To be successful as a legal advisor, you should possess excellent analytical, research and writing skills, the ability to make good judgments, and be able to work well within a team. Ultimately, a top-notch legal advisor should have strong communication skills, be able to manage a large workload, meet deadlines and remain up-to-date with laws.
Responsibilities:
Conducting legal analysis and researching legal matters.
Providing advice on legal matters.
Drafting legal agreements, opinions, memorandum, and briefing documents.
Reviewing legal material/documents.
Formulating formalities regarding settlements of disputes.
Monitoring the implementation of the legal clauses.
Exposure in reviewing and drafting contracts such as
NDAs, MOUs, Technology Collaborations etc.,
Procurement contracts from buyers and suppliers.
Warranty contracts
Service contracts like IT and licensing contracts and support in India and Global            operations.
Exposure in automotive contract knowledge is an added advantage.
Liasioning with legal counsels.
Handling overseas legal documents will be an added advantage.
Practising background / experience before the courts will be an added advantage.
Experience in MNCs / Manufacturing companies is preferred.
Any other assignment as directed by the reporting supervisor.
Requirements:
Qualification: Bachelor's degree in law.  Additional qualifications in law is added advantage.
Experience in the law field ranging from 5 to 10 years.
Age : 30 35 years
Strong analytical and research skills.
Effective interpersonal and communication skills.  Ability to work well within a team, cross-functional teams and individually.
Ability to work long hours when needed.
Willing to undertake travel in India and outside India depending on business requirements.
Good computer knowledge such as Word, Excel, Power Point and google smart sheet.
Staying within 15 Kms or in and around Bommasandra area is added advantage. 
Compensation is as per industry standard and is not a limiting constraint for meritorious and deserving candidate.

Responsible for NPD DVP testing & Monthly testings and Reporting.
Preparation and planning of DVP test plans as per the SOR.
Conducting the tests as per schedule and prepare the Test reports on-time.
Preparation and planning of Test fixtures with NPD for new projects.
Preparation of new test report formats and test schedules for new projects.
Recording the before and After test observations with photos and updating in test reports.
Maintaining the good 5S in Test lab with proper identification.
Traceability of Tested parts with Labeling of product name, Type of test, Test start and End date and store it in designated place as per storage plan.
Highlight the Test observations to top management with proper information. 
Preparation of CAPA for Failed tests and documentation.
Preparation of SOP, CP for new machines and revision of documents for existing machines.
Ensuring integrity of the quality  management system is maintained when changes to the quality management system are planned and implemented.
Involve in Continual improvement activities, To be provided best Kaizen ideas.
Involving the other QA activities whenever required.
On-time completion of regular tests and upload the reports in portal.
Involving in Salt spray testing of Child parts/ products to ensure the product level quality.
Before and After test - Performance test reports  to be made with EOL for Electronic products.
Ensure the Preventive maintenance are conducted on-time.

cells.value:
Role and Responsibilities
We are looking for a PLM Windchill implementor who can build and implement functional programs through Windchill & Java. Windchill PLM Implementation.•Hands on experience in Customization and implementation projects using Workflow, PDM, BOMs,Windchill Project Manager, MultiCAD Environment

Should have strong Windchill Implementation experience (2 Projects Minimum)
Should have participated in Requirements gathering with Customer for Windchill Implementation projects
Should be able to Design Solutions for Windchill Implementation projects
Understand Software design lifecycle models and methodologies Strong Understanding of Windchill Architecture
Should have strong functional knowledge in PLM domain & Engineering Workflow’s
Able to lead technical implementation Project in analyzing business requirements and contributes to the design of PTC Solutions intended to address complex customer business processes
Follows quality processes for tasks with appropriate reviews. Participates in sharing knowledge within the team.
Windchill Products:

Windchill PDMLink, Windchill SIM, Service Parts, Arbortext Publishing Engine, InService
Database: MS SQL Server Enterprise & Oracle 19c Enterprise & Standard 19.3.0.0
Data Migration experience will be added advantage


Windchill Versions: 10.x/11.x/12.x Relevant Work Experiences
1 to 2 Years experience in Windchill Implementation



We are looking for candidates who are experienced in below said skills.

Strong Windchill Implementation Knowledge (at least 1-2 years of Windchill PLM Customization experience will be added advantage) Strong in Java and Windchill Solution Designing

Assigns project tasks including installing and configuring PTC software, customization, GUI development, testing, debugging, data migration and deployment support to project team members

Provides input into the future software functionality,implementation methodology and customization standards

Reviews teamwork work products to ensure that they are accurate, consistent and meet clients requirements

Strong PLM Domain knowledge

Should have experience on CAD Data Management in Windchill with different CAD software's like Creo, AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Catia, UG NX etc.

Have executed at least 2~ 3 implementation project as solution architect

Have Understanding of database administration,database design

Knowledge of quality processes and their implementation.

Strong interpersonal and analytical skills.

Good knowledge of Windchill Product suites


Qualifications and Education Requirements
Bachelor Engineering Degree with 5+ years’ experience

Responsibility:

Quality Management Functions :-				
Implement all relevant procedures described in the Quality Management System (QMS) and ensure compliance.
Ensure that all in-house systems and procedures are updated, revised and modified to meet the needs of external certification bodies.
Respond to customer complaints putting in containment actions, full analysis, poka-yokes (error proofing), and implementing short-term and long-term countermeasures.	
Champion a program for the implementation and sustainment of a continuous improvement culture
Act as a point of contact for warranty issues.
Update quality documentation and communicate to carry forward lessons learned from quality concerns in new customer contracts.	
Ensure that all necessary systems and procedures are in place to satisfy all customer requirements and audits.
Introduce new systems and procedures where appropriate.
Train others in all aspects of the quality system and application of procedures.	
Undertake internal and process audits of the Quality Management System (QMS).			
Management of the Quality Engineers and Technicians in the sign-off of parts and the resolution of internal/external quality concerns.
Establish and refine quality sign-off instructions, standards and documentation.
Report against agreed quality metrics on a monthly basis.	
Lead regular inspection meetings with representatives from appropriate departments to establish an action plan for improving build quality.
In conjunction with the Supplier Quality Assurance function, reduce the effect of non-conforming supplier materials on the production area quality.
Attend various meetings and action/communicate instructions	.
Produce written reports and make presentations.
Undertake continuous training and development.
Perform root cause analysis and resolve problems.		
Stay current and up to date on any changes that may affect the supply and demand of needed products and materials and advise others of any impact
Identify business improvement opportunities within the organization
Identify and deploy the technical skill sets, resource levels and systems to deliver projects, including the engagement of external resources as required
Develop, implement and manage key performance indicators (KPIs) for each area of responsibility	
Set department objectives/KPIs and review and assess ongoing performance of direct reports	
Ensure KPIs are met by working to the overall plan, including management of, and reporting		
Report on achievement of targets and identify any actions required.
Ensure that the function operates in accordance with any health, safety and environmental policies and procedures to ensure the safety and wellbeing of staff and visitors.				
Conduct risk assessments of processes and tasks in the department.

People Management :-
Ensure the delivery of the People Strategy within area of accountability				
Manage, coach and develop a high performing Quality Operations team that meets agreed objectives and which delivers best practice results, added value and continuous improvements			
Manage and lead the team, ensuring adequate staffing levels	
Motivate and coach the team to operational success
Monitor the completion of tasks and ensure good performance and record on appropriate systems	
Consistently promote high standards through personal example and roll out through the team so that each member of the team understands the standards and behaviours expected of them		
Review, implement and update company records e.g. training matrices, performance reviews, risk assessments
Communicate KPIs from the strategic annual plan so that each employee is aware		
Provide technical expertise to the team
Manage contractors on site to ensure they meet legal and company requirements			

Financial and Budget Control :-
Input and hold responsibility for Quality budgets
Responsible for achieving budget and forecast
Prepare the annual Quality budget and forecasts and all Ca

cells.value:
1. Responsible for finalization of financial statements (standalone/ consolidated) and results on a quarterly and annual basis under IGAAP and Ind AS.
2. Co-ordinations with auditors/ consultants for finalization of financial accounts, tax audit, and transfer pricing.
3. Preparation of monthly MIS (standalone/ consolidated), presentations, and other reports and scrutiny of general ledger accounts.
4. Reporting to management over various other special reports like the performance of subsidiaries, inventory aging reports etc
5. Preparation of income tax computation, advance tax computation, income tax return etc.
6. Assist in the finalization of annual budgets / consolidated budgets and forecasts on a periodical basis Preparation of budgets, performing variance analysis to determine the difference between projected & actual results and implementing corrective actions for the same
7. Purchase order release control with the checking in SAP
8. Preparation and submission of Annual Progress Report (APR) of Company to Export authority
9. Proper maintenance of monthly fixed assets register, posting of depreciation with shift change control, capitalization of assets, Calculation of profit/ loss on sale of fixed assets.
10. Vouching and verification of journal vouchers /invoices before initiating payments and other overhead payments. Ensuring that voucher is correctly posted, TDS correctly deposited and have proper supporting and authorization
11. Coordination with other department and provide the data as required
12. Evaluation and review of internal controls & resource management
13. Ensuring input credit of GST are properly taken and all requirements of GST Act is complied with.
14 Periodically taking physical inventory of raw material, store and spare items, finished goods

Job Description

  Role                    :       Diploma Engineering  Trainee 
  Reporting Supervisor       :      Prakash,H
  Location                 :      U2, Bangalore 
  Position Category          :      Staff Grade


Main Responsibilities:

1.Ensure Poka-yoke is Working & update the Check list
2.Ensure master list of Poke is Yoke is in Place .
3.Ensure SPC Rules Daily 
4.Following TS activities
5.Safety gloves
6.Daily Tool History Card weekly 
7.TPM Checklist update & Verification
8.Maintain all Relevant records up to date
9.Daily Srap-outgoing Check & Sign










 Desired Profile :

● Education : Diploma- in Mechanical Engineering
● Age : 24 years to 28 Years
● Experience : 3- 4  Years 
● Good in communication (Oral and Written Communication) and Computer Skills.
● Candidates willing to relocate and stay in and around Bommasandra / Electronic City / Anekal Area are preferred.Candidates residing in these are also preferred.

cells.value:
Role & responsibilities
Documentation of relevant Procedures and Matrices for Environmental Management System, Social and Governance due diligence.
Develop GRI / SASB Standard Matrices.
Ensure the Effective Implementation of system across the Group entities.
Verify the Regulations amendments through Sheel technologies and update the relevant procedures.
Interact with Plant ESG Champions on the Performance and Progress made against Objectives.
Internal Audits of Manufacturing sites Local on site, Outstation Team meeting EMS/OHSMS.
Corrective Action review and verification of effectiveness.
Understanding the Third party Evaluation and support plants for Evaluation e.g Ecovadis, SAQ..
Documenting Company policies relevant to ESG.
Monthly Dashboard to CSO on the Progress on ESG
Explore methods of GHG Offset and recommendation to CSO
Other Requirements:
B.E /B Tech 5 to 10 Years Experience
Knowledge of QMS EMS, OHSMS, GHG,CSR
Qualified Internal Auditor.
Automotive Customers Interaction.

cells.value:
	Knowledge & understanding of governmental policies and corporate/industry information security practices and standards.
	Experience in compliance, information security policy development & documentation.
	Experience of development / implementing awareness/training programs in corporate security.
	Conduct information security awareness training and education programs as appropriate.
	Knowledge of IT processes and controls and strong understanding of risk and control frameworks.
	General knowledge of information security regulatory requirements and standards such as ISO 27001/2, ISMS, TISAX etc.
	Define, Implement, and monitor enterprise information security and IT risk management program.
	Proactive risk assessment and management of all risks associated with the IT environment. 
	Communicate risks and mitigation recommendations with the system administrator and cross domain experts.
	Execute VA / PT and ensures vulnerabilities are managed by directing periodic vulnerability scans of servers, and network devices connected to university networks.
	Manage Information security incidents and problem management. Evaluate security incidents and determine response, if any, is needed and coordinate support team or OEM support, including technical incident response teams, when sensitive information is breached.
	Act proactively to prevent potential disaster situations by ensuring proper protections are set up e.g., intrusion detection and prevention systems, firewalls, and effective physical safeguards, and provide for the availability of computer resources.
	Testing and Implementation of mitigation and protection for all devices and applications across all vulnerabilities
	Expertise on Encryption, DLP & MDM management.
	Experience in Endpoint/Antivirus management.
	Experience in Gateway/Firewalls management.
	Expertise in designing & managing LAN/WAN networks.
	Management & deployment of security certificates like SSL Certificates.
	Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to effectively communicate with a wide range of individuals and constituencies in a diverse community.

Qualification and other requirements:

	B.E/B.Tech/BSc/MSc/Equivalent.
	Certification like CISSP/CISA/CISM/ CompTIA Security+/ CASP+/SSCP/CCSP or other information systems security certifications is added advantage.

------------------------------------------- End of Document	------------------------------------------------------

Job Description

  Role                    :      GET / DET
  Reporting Supervisor       :      Ramachandra.S,S

Main Responsibilities:

● To ensure Ground floor the availability of Input Material for allotted machines 
● Ensure Skilled Manpower allocated  
● Previous day production GAP analysis and report to HOD in daily review

● Route-card,Checks list,& tool list verification

● Verification of Production Logs and report for HOD review

 Desired Profile :

● Education : BE / Diploma - in Mechanical Engineering
● Age : 23 years to 24 Years
● Experience : 0- 1 Years 
● Good in communication (Oral and Written Communication) and Computer Skills.
● Candidates willing to relocate and stay in and around Bommasandra / Electronic City / Anekal Area are preferred.Candidates residing in these are also preferred.

•  Support operation of SMT line including solder paste dispensing, solder paste inspection, dispensing machine, pick and place machinery, reflow oven, automated optical inspection, as well as various backend assembly processes including conformal coating, robotic soldering, wave solder, harness and connector assembly.
• Specific direct responsibilities will include testing and failure analysis support through development and improvement of programs and processes for ICT, Functional testing, EOL & traceability systems.
• Develop, program and improve all SMT processes and process validations.
• Optimize setup/programs to improve equipment efficiencies and output, accordingly        should establish the new line setup with Interactions of functional teams like R&D, PPC & Production for smooth operation as per customer requirements
• Coordinate with suppliers and meet the timelines related to fixtures, testing equipments with respect to cycle time of each process and takt time.
•Reduce product cost and improve quality, poke yoke implementation in shopfloor.
• Conduct failure mode analysis and develop corrective action plans.
• Maintain and write work instructions, process flow, and process failure modes effects analysis documents.

cells.value:
Role & responsibilities
Summary: We are searching for a proactive and versatile Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate should possess a strong foundation in software development, with expertise in Java programming, Python, API integration, PHP, and web development tools. This role demands not only technical proficiency but also a keen ability to collaborate across various departments, working closely with internal business users, external software providers, and internal technical teams. Also, the crucial responsibility of maintaining existing systems. The primary objective is to enhance productivity by implementing software projects tailored to meet the diverse business requirements of various departments. 
ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES 
• Develop and maintain high-quality software solutions using Java, Python, PHP, and other relevant programming languages also should know web development tools. 
• Design, implement, and maintain APIs for seamless integration with various systems and services. 
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams and internal business users to understand their requirements and deliver software solutions that enhance productivity. 
• Work closely with external software providers, managing integration's, and customizing systems to meet specific business needs. 
• Gain an in-depth understanding of the current systems implemented within the organization and provide ongoing support and maintenance as needed. 
• Understand and navigate various SaaS-based applications and data analytics tools to address specific departmental needs. 
• Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software while ensuring a seamless user experience. 
• Create technical documentation for reference and reporting. 
• Stay updated on industry trends and advancements in software development, tools, and methodologies. 
REQUIREMENTS 
1. Proven work experience as a Software Engineer or similar role. 
2. Proficiency in Java programming, Python, PHP, and familiar with web development tools. 
3. Experience in API design and implementation. 
4. Strong interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with different internal and external teams. 
5. Ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly. 
6. Certifications in relevant programming languages or technologies will be an added advantage. 
7. Should have Analytical, Communication, Interpersonal and Problem-solving skills. 
QUALIFICATIONS AND EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS 
Bachelor of Computer Science/Electronics & Communication with 2+ years experience.
PREFERRED SKILLS 
JAVA, API Integration, DBMS, Web Development, CMS, PHP, HTML, .Net, Android/iOS Apps

This role demands not only technical proficiency but also a keen ability to collaborate across various departments, working closely with internal business users, external software providers, and internal technical teams. Also, the crucial responsibility of maintaining existing systems. The primary objective is to enhance productivity by implementing software projects tailored to meet the diverse business requirements of various departments. 
ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES 
• Develop and maintain high-quality software solutions using Java, Python, PHP, and other relevant programming languages also should know web development tools. 
• Design, implement, and maintain APIs for seamless integration with various systems and services. 
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams and internal business users to understand their requirements and deliver software solutions that enhance productivity. 
• Work closely with external software providers, managing integration's, and customizing systems to meet specific business needs. 
• Gain an in-depth understanding of the current systems implemented within the organization and provide ongoing support and maintenance as needed. 
• Understand and navigate various SaaS-based applications and data analytics tools to address specific departmental needs. 
• Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software while ensuring a seamless user experience. 
• Create technical documentation for reference and reporting. 
• Stay updated on industry trends and advancements in software development, tools, and methodologies. 
REQUIREMENTS 
1. Proven work experience as a Software Engineer or similar role. 
2. Proficiency in Java programming, Python, PHP, and familiar with web development tools. 
3. Experience in API design and implementation. 
4. Strong interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with different internal and external teams. 
5. Ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly. 
6. Certifications in relevant programming languages or technologies will be an added advantage. 
7. Should have Analytical, Communication, Interpersonal and Problem-solving skills. 
QUALIFICATIONS AND EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS 
Bachelor of Computer Science/Electronics & Communication with 2+ years experience.
PREFERRED SKILLS 
JAVA, API Integration, DBMS, Web Development, CMS, PHP, HTML, .Net, Android/iOS Apps

cells.value:
Responsibility:
•Bill-Booking of GRN done invoices.
•Verifying and accounting of Manual Invoices.
•Accounting of manual invoices to respective charge A/c.
•Preparing Invoices for Payment process
•Verifying E-way Bill details against debit notes and reporting to HOD
•Mailing of RTV debit notes to supplier and closure of debit notes on timely basis
•Accounting of manual debit notes and credit notes as per HOD instructions.
•Updating of GST Status of supplier on Payment advice
•Passing of Payment entries in ERP
•Writing down cheques as per payment advice along with vendor Account Numbers.
•Submission of prepared cheques to HOD and Plant head
•Ensuring signatures and couriering cheques to Corporate Office
•Updating Unit Cheque track sheet on timely basis
•Accounting of Negative sales orders for internal cancellation of Invoices
•Accounting of Customer rejection invoices and Shortage receipts
•Accounting of Cash Vouchers and reconciliation physical cash and Cash Book
•Closure of IOU Payments within time limit
•Passing prepayment entries and closure of prepayments within time limit
•Updating of monthly provision sheet and ensuring accounting of provision bills within month end
•Scanning of Fixed Asset Bills along with supporting documents
•Preparing GSTR-2B reconciliation and reporting to HOD
•Customer GRN Details updating and providing data to Internal audit purpose
•Mailing job work vendors for confirmation of Stock at quater end
•Preparing 3rd Party stock confirmation data and reporting to HOD
•Accounting of AR Invoices and generating Eway bill.
•Accounting of Supplementary invoices as per HOD instructions.
•Preparing and updating documents for Internal Audit controls-smart sheet updations
•Reconciliation of Vendor Ledgers
•Ensuring proper filing and maintaining of all documents	


Qualification and other requirements:
•Qualification: B. Com
•Experience: 4 - 5 Years
•Good verbal and written communication skills.
•Good in computer skills i.e., MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
•Positive attitude: willingness to learn and flexibility.

cells.value:
Responsibility:

Coordinate with the FI Inspectors for all the section lines.
Understand the Assembly line gaps and make improvement activities
Responsible for PDI report preparation & Upgradation
Educating Final Inspectors with defect parts & Guiding for inspection
Attending & Analyzing line issues, giving feed back to Prod/QC Department
Collecting the daily reports from FI Inspectors for review
Updating the previous day issues in morning meeting
Monitoring the 100% inspection done as per customer requirement
Analyzing the rejection parts on daily basis and report the same to supervisors
Follow 3C & 5S, Obey Safety & Quality pledge and follow my area my responsibility
Support to FI Inspectors during Non availability of FI Inspectors.
Any other task / assignment as directed by reporting officer or reviewing officer.

Qualification and other requirements:-
B.E. or Diploma Mechanical with 0 to 2 years of experience in Quality at Auto Ancillary Industry.
Good verbal and written communication skills.
Good in computer skills and knowledge of ERP.
Knowledge of IATF 16949, TPM, Quality System.
Diligent; good in analytical skill with problem solving techniques

-  End of Document  -

cells.value:
The Regional Sales Head is responsible for  business of all products in a specified region or geography.
He is completely responsible for appointing, developing, engaging  distributors to promote the brand and achieve the sales targets for the region.
He is responsible for  Debtors management in his region.
He is responsible for regional market share, counter share , brand promotion.
He manages a sales team for the region.
Collaborating with senior executives to establish and execute the sales goal for the region.
Managing a sales team in order to meet or exceed  corporate set goals.
Conducting Monthly/Quarterly/Half yearly review with sales team .
Forecasting annual, quarterly and monthly sales goals.
Assisting his team in their techniques.
Developing specific plans to ensure growth both long term and short term.
Educating sales team on strategies, seminars and meetings.
Reviewing expenses and recommending improvements.
Regional manager is responsible and accountable for all sales promotion activities

cells.value:
 Role will be responsible for overseeing the end-to-end quality processes, including Continuous Quality Engineering (CQE), Supplier Quality Engineering (SQE), and Quality Control (QC).
Develop and implement a comprehensive quality strategy aligned with the company's objectives.
Drive a culture of continuous improvement and innovation in quality management processes.
Lead the CQE team in establishing and maintaining robust quality management systems.
Implement tools and methodologies to monitor and enhance product quality throughout the entire product life cycle.
Collaborate with suppliers to ensure adherence to quality standards and specifications.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with key suppliers to drive continuous improvement in supplier quality.
Oversee the QC team in conducting thorough inspections and testing of products at various stages of production.
Implement statistical process control methods to identify and address potential quality issues proactively.
Define key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to measure and report on the effectiveness of quality processes.
Provide regular reports and updates to senior management on quality performance.

cells.value:
Product Cost Estimation, Bill of material, Design and Development of Electronic & Mechanical Clusters with at least 3 years’ experience  + Tool design and Document reviews. 
Lead a team of 3 to 5 Design engineers by way of training them during design of new clusters .
Good knowledge in design calculations for Rubber compressions ratio, design to meet IP 65, 66 & 67 requirements. Good knowledge in Raw materials used for clusters.
Co-ordination with QC department for various testing & resolving of problems at various stages of job execution. 
Co-ordination with Purchase department for material procurements. 
 To collect the inputs related to Tooling/Process/Material for preparing quotations against Customer RFQs. 
Product Design & development from PROTO (RPT) to SOP with defined APQP plan.
To conduct DFMEA before design review & drawing releasing for development.
Leading role in product and process VA/VE.
Tracking and documentation of projects through Product Engineering Process in product life cycle management (PLM) Tool.
Tracking Project Costing/budgeting.
Interacting with customers and Suppliers.
Leading and review the process design engineering for developing assembly lines  This includes development of  Jigs &fixture, gauge, procurement of New machines etc.,        
Creating design concept, detailing layout of 3D models and 2D drawings auto components Geometric Dimension and Tolerance. Clarifying technical queries pertaining to project & application software.

Managing ECN as well as design reviews on regular basis and implementing engineering changes and originating design change request.
Worked on Bench-marking and implement the same in process and product development.
Product reverse engineering having customer sample.

cells.value:
Responsibility:

Coordinate with the FI Inspectors for all the section lines.
Responsible for PDI report preparation & Upgradation
Educating Final Inspectors with defect parts & Guiding for inspection
Collecting the daily reports from FI Inspectors for review
Updating the previous day issues in morning meeting
Monitoring the 100% inspection done as per customer requirement
Analyzing the rejection parts on daily basis and report the same to supervisors
Follow 3C & 5S, Obey Safety & Quality pledge and follow my area my responsibility
Support to FI Inspectors during Non availability of FI Inspectors.
Any other task / assignment as directed by reporting officer or reviewing officer.

Qualification and other requirements:-
+2 or I.T.I with 0 to 2 years of experience in Quality at Auto Ancillary Industry.
Good verbal and written communication skills.
Good in computer skills and knowledge of ERP.

-  End of Document  -
